## Interested in a career in blockchain? Come hear from TriliTech on December 7th! ✨

[Click here to register!](https://london-csm.symplicity.com/students/index.php?ss=is&_ksl=1&mode=form&s=event&id=55d3ae74777c2cccd9c71d1e6aa15508)

**About Trilitech:**
TriliTech is a Tezos blockchain R&D and Entrepreneur Hub based in London, UK. Our objective is to further develop and catalyse unique opportunities for the Tezos ecosystem, both on and off-chain. We are building a business development and adoption team to lead the global promotion of the Tezos blockchain, a leading layer 1 protocol launched in 2018. 

Tezos is an open-source platform that addresses key barriers facing blockchain adoptions for assets and applications backed by a global community of validators, researchers and builders. Our current corporate partners include Redbull Racing, McLaren, Ubisoft, Societe Generale and many others. Projects built on the Tezos blockchain include Hic Et Nuc, Objkt. com, Interpop, OneOf and Kukai.


## LBS Blockchain Association Kick-Off: Sign-Ups Open!

Time: Tuesday, Nov. 30 @ 7:15 PM

[Click to Sign-Up!](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/lbs-blockchain-association-2021-kick-off-tickets-211665877337) 

Are you interested in learning more about Blockchain or Crypto? Or considering a career in Web 3.0? Look no further ✨

The LBS Blockchain Association aims to make Blockchain and Crypto accessible to all. We've got a great roster of events & initiatives on deck for the year and are looking to build out the team behind it! Come learn more about what we do & the roles we're looking to fill. 

Note - you don't need to be a blockchain superstar to join us, blockchain newbies are very welcome.

**_Presentation will be followed by drinks at the Windsor._**
